head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LANNING, JOHN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LANNING, JOHN M.

block.p: LANNING-John M. Jr. On August 5, 2000 of Maplewood, New Jersey. Beloved husband of Susan Browne Lanning. Devoted father of Elizabeth Ann of Manhattan and Amanda Ashton Lanning of Maplewood. Loving son of John M. and Eleanor Lyness Lanning Sr. of Chestnut Hill, MA. Dear brother of Ellen Lanning Masica of Carmel, IN. Loving uncle of Andrew; Caroline; Allison; Amanda and devoted Jeremy. Relatives and friends are invited to attend the funeral mass at St. Rose of Lima Church, 50 Short Hills Avenue, Short Hills, NJ on Friday, August 11 at 10:00 AM. Interment St. Rose of Lima Cemetery, Short Hills. Visitation will be held at The Jacob A. Holle Funeral Home, 2122 Millburn Avenue, Maplewood, Wednesday, 7-9 PM and Thursday, 2-4 & 7-9 PM. Donations to the John M. Lanning Jr. Scholarship Fund c/o Fordham University Development Office: 113 W. 60th Street, NY, NY 10023-7484. Att. Judith Katz would be appreciated.
